data.convo: Hey, they linked to my review on their website! Just click on News & Links and then on Customer Review http://www.ullrichshoerepair.com/newslinks.htm Like Steve Martin in \"The Jerk\" when he finds his name in the phone book, I guess I'm somebody now! \n\nAll kidding aside, Ullrich's came in handy last week. I broke a heel and they did a great job repairing it. They've resoled Rick's shoes, repaired a tear in his leather jacket, and repaired one of my purses. We've always been happy with their work.
